thread.section_title: Even Hotel New York - Midtown East - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good value and choice!
thread.title_full: Very good value and choice! - Review of Even Hotel New York - Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tony C
title: Very good value and choice!
text: Recently opened hotel in midtown. Great location with attractions & restaurants nearby. Hotel room was clean, modern with large bathroom and shower. Room small, but normal for NYC. Good value with fitness and health activities as a new feature. Over security hotel features are very good. Staff very accommodating and polite. The hotel features a bar and eating area to relax on 2nd floor. The room price was right for NYC and I would recommend this hotel for value and location!
